Name: Scout Rush
Summary: Fast Feudal Age into Stable Scouts. Aggressive opening for early map control.
Follow Up: Add a 2nd Stable or transition into Knights in Castle Age. Wall at home once you have map control. Build farms steadily — aim for 8-10 farms before clicking Castle Age.
Benchmark 2: Stable down immediately on reaching Feudal

Name: Archer Rush
Summary: Fast Feudal into Archery Range mass Archers. Strong sustained ranged pressure.
Follow Up: Add a 2nd Archery Range when wood allows. Build farms steadily for food income. Transition to Crossbowmen in Castle Age.
Benchmark 2: Archery Range down immediately on reaching Feudal
Benchmark 4: Constant Archer production — never idle the Range

Name: Men-at-Arms Rush
Summary: Create 3 Militia in Dark Age, upgrade to Men-at-Arms on reaching Feudal for early aggression, then transition into Archers.
Follow Up: Transition into Archers behind the Men-at-Arms aggression. Build farms for food economy. Go Crossbowmen in Castle Age.
Benchmark 3: Men-at-Arms upgrade researched immediately on reaching Feudal
Benchmark 4: Archers follow up behind the aggression

Name: Drush (Dark Age Rush)
Summary: Send 3 Militia in Dark Age to harass enemy economy while booming behind it. Buys time to reach Feudal with a stronger economy.
Follow Up: Drush is the most flexible opening. Go Fast Castle, go Archers, or wall and boom — the Militia buy you time. Keep farming up.
Benchmark 3: Militia arrive at enemy base by ~9:00
